website_summaries.verdict: This set is good for kids who are very active and interested in sports play, but it is not as heavy-duty as some.
pros: Includes a soccer net and basketball goal
Trampoline can be set next to the play set or removed
Has four spots for swinging features
Includes a glider and a trapeze bar
A decent price for a set that is a good product for smaller children
cons: Each station maxes out at 80-pound capacity, so it's not ideal for older/larger kids
The top bar is less than six feet high

website_summaries.verdict: The eight activity stations can entertain up to nine kids at once. Ideal for younger kids.
pros: Each station can hold up to 80 pounds
Trampoline is a separate piece from the rest of the set
cons: The metal is thinner and not as durable as some other choices

website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced swing set that can entertain up to nine kids at a time. For the money, the variety this set offers is exceptional.
pros: Includes a variety of fun stations, including a trampoline and basketball hoop
cons: It's designed for kids age 8 and under
The weight limit of most stations is 80 pounds, which means that older elementary-aged kids may be too big for it

customer_reviews.title: Kind of janky
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty thin steel, not the material the swing sets of my youth were made from. Already had bolts sheer off and had to replace them with more durable pieces. This might last my kids a couple of years max. I hope at least. And putting this son of a gun together, let me tell you the directions are nearly useless. The way the parts are packaged and labeled (or not in most cases) was maddening. It was a guess game at best. Took 3 sober, 2 buzzed and 1 intoxicated adults about 4 hours to assemble, another 2 hours to unassemble the parts put together wrong and another hour to get it together completely. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ktsimms

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES her new playground She can't use everything yet but it it very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bellow

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It hasn’t even been a year yet and this play set is falling apart and looks terrible . My daughter has barely played on it
customer_reviews.author: Maria122690

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t as easy as others stated for us to assemble, that said it wasn’t hard either but it did take us longer than two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bargain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow-what a bargain!! So much included for such an affordable price! All parts/pieces were included and the directions were very clear. If my husband and I can put it together—so can you. It’s been enjoyed by 5 kids ages 1-5 at once and held up fine. Hoping to get a few years out of it but don’t expect more than that and that’s totally fine with me. This isn’t your last forever playset but it gets the kids outside expending energy and it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Drpc10

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Have contacted manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time however, the box was torn and battered. Product missing multiple pieces. Two connecting bottom bars for the soccer goal, steps for the slide, basket ball, soccer ball, air pump. They cannot even use the slide at this moment. This was a special gift for my grandchildren. Very disappointed. Have contacted manufacturer. More will be revealed.
customer_reviews.author: lisahoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Great playground for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We set this up about a month ago, and our kids love to play on it! We have a 5 y.o. and a 1 y.o. We added a toddler swing in place of the swinging monkey bar for now. The slide is pretty sticky, but it’s also crazy humid right now, so that could be the issue. We had to add a couple 2x4” pieces under one side of the slide ladder because our ground isn’t very level, but that has worked very well. We also put the little trampoline in our basement so the boys can play on that when it’s rainy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great for small children
customer_reviews.text: Missing the very last part we needed to finish setting up...they sent one but it took almost a month to receive it. It's a nice set for very small children, but it won't work for older kids (probably eight or nine and up). In that sense, it's a little expensive because it will only be good for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B Racca

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kid plenty to do keep them occupied.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old He loves it & so do I. He gets on everything it took about 5 hrs for my husband to put together with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lotongia

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, won't budge in 60-90mph winds.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Like a lot. We live in an area that gets high winds (60-90mph) and this thing takes it. We did buy extra ground anchors, even though it came with plenty, we worried about the high winds, with that and the anchors it came with, I'm pretty sure this thing could be hit with a tornado and it won't budge. Only downside is the soccer net, it's not easy to do even without high winds. We just couldn't get it to go on properly.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This is the ultimate little playground set!
customer_reviews.text: This came delivered via FedEx in one long box weighing about 100lbs. All pieces were included. Family helped assemble it during the afternoon and came together well. Looks great and the kids love it! A great set for small children ages 3 to 8.
customer_reviews.author: jray

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the ass
customer_reviews.text: The first set was missing parts such as an entire leg so I had it replaced. Still haven’t sent the first back just in case I needed spare parts for the 2nd set. Between 2 sets we still don’t have all the parts to put together. It was awful watching my 3 year old break down on her birthday because we couldn’t put her swing set together and now I have to experience that all over again. I’m going to have to duct tape the 2 boxes together to even send it back due to both packages being in horrible shape, writhing, and dimensions. $600 later and I have 1 full swing set. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B-Ran

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 2-year-old loves all of the features of this swing set. None of the parts are labeled, so make sure you follow the instructions. The 2 steps for the slide are too far apart and the first step is very high. There is no way a toddler can climb the stairs on his/her own, let alone get up the first step. Our toddler is 33 inches tall and the first step is at his waist. The manufacturers need to double the number of steps.
customer_reviews.author: Acoustic Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Great playspace for the money!
customer_reviews.text: As expected, this took a day for two pretty mechanically talented men to put together - BUT it was SO worth it! The grandkids were SO excited to see it and they love it. A great buy! Definitely would recommend this product for folks with kids (or grands) 2-8 yrs old. Review the weight limits before ordering so you are not disappointed. A great set to see if your kids or grands will use a set enough to justify a far bigger investment in a heavier "grow with them" set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swingset
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there are some reviews stating this playground set is junky or not durable or cheap but it most definitely is none of those things. Yes, the instructions are crap, they leave out some steps and they don't make a bit of sense. However, my husband was able to figure it out fine and he put the whole thing together by himself. It took a few hours to put together but our kids LOVE this swingset. They will play outside on this for hours. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony and Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This swing set is awesome! I was a little disappointed that when I received the box, it was ripped open and screws were falling out, I was worried that I wasn’t going to be able to put it together.. somehow I ended up having every piece+extra. My boys have only played on it for about 3 hrs so far but they loved it! I love how sturdy it feels! I had my 3 boys (age 4 59lbs, age 2 28lbs, and 8 months 22lbs) and it held up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I can t believe this, scam!
customer_reviews.text: Im so sad i lost my job during covid19 and i bought this to make my daughter happy during the quarantine i honestly did not have the $320 but i did it for her and the quality on this product is so bad, its got scratches everywhere i will send pictures!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus d.

customer_reviews.title: Good but some hiccups
customer_reviews.text: So, this was actually really hard to put together. I don’t know if I’m just stupid but I could not manage to get the soccer net on so I just gave up. My kids only 2 so he won’t need it anyway. Everything else was ok to assemble but took a while. There is some damage to the set, nothing terrible so I can deal with it. However the slide legs didn’t have holes for the steps! So we had to do that ourselves. Otherwise it’s really not bad for the price. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Asmah Mohamad

customer_reviews.title: Besy buy I ever made for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Not as hard to put together as i thought it would be daughter loved it she never really veen to a playground with all the extra activity like this swing set has so she still trying to get the handmg of it but sure she will enjoy it for years to come the trampoline was the hardest to put together requires little man power
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this set ! The only issue we had was figuring out how to put the net on. We’ve had awful storms and winds that picked up our 12ft trampoline and threw it at our house but YET even WITHOUT staking down the play set EVERYTHING stayed in its place, this play set is definitely underpriced
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart less than a year in.
customer_reviews.text: It took quite a while to put together. Seemed great at first but the anchors that are provided do not hold the set to the ground very well so I had to buy better ones. Less then one year and the see-saw swing broke with my children on it. Thank goodness they were fine but it could have been very bad. Thought this was great but it’s not lasting very long. I’m noticing parts are starting to rust too. Seemed great for the price but it doesn’t hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: michelle a gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy well made swing set and has a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy well made swing set and has a lot of exercise components for small children--The grandchildren ages 1 and 3 love it and swing slide or jump daily. I missed clicking a few starts!! haha-- I rate this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: FOFOE MULLIS

customer_reviews.title: This play set has lots of bells and whistles!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this swing set with all of its special features! My son and daughter-in-law put it together in about a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Time for the Grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just put this together for our grandchildren. We were impressed by how well it went together and how sturdy the parts seem. It took us about four hours total to put it together. The assembly would have been a little bit easier if the parts were labeled; which is the only reason I am giving this at four instead of five. The only other suggestion I have is, I think that the rings and trapeze bar should have longer chains or ones that can be adjusted. My four year old granddaughter cannot reach them without a boost.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: Not easy item “”
customer_reviews.text: Was very hard to put it together the Directions directions was not easy the parts was not marked and the package was not the best nuts and bolts was Thrown In the box “did have to get bolt and nuts that was missing so call easy to Assemble have taken us over 5 hours to get it done No I will not recommend this item to any one
customer_reviews.author: Jr Main

customer_reviews.title: Great hole playground
customer_reviews.text: Very good hole playground. We’ve been using it for a month and it’s proven to be durable and well designed for kids in the 2-8 year old range. More attractive in real life than the photo on amazon. Took a few hours to put together, but very doable for 2 adults.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Lord

customer_reviews.title: Contact seller
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing set and got a good deal on it too. However i am lookong to buy a second trampoline JUST the trampoline that came with this set. Anybody know how to do this?
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Kids love is, impeccable customer service team.
customer_reviews.text: This took two guys a few hours to build. My kids love it, not I need to find a fort for them to hide in. I think this was a better choice than the kid sets made out of cedar, I’ve seen bad comments on the cedar not being durable. This is metal with rubber coating for the kids, it gets well over 100 here in GA. Customer service was impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Phuong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Some parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Was missing soccer net and lots of bolts bolts could be because box was destroyed when I received it but soccer net should have been inside
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Alvira

customer_reviews.title: easier to assemble than what reviews may show
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few reviews about how difficult the assembly is I had my doubts but placed my order anyway. I assembled the entire playset by myself in under 2 hours in my driveway using only a wrench and a cordless drill/screwdriver. I wasn't even in a big rush and got it completely assembled without any difficulty following the instructions. My 2.5 year old and the neighbor kids love it! It's better quality than i expected, especially for the price. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett W

customer_reviews.title: Great if your kids are 20 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: My son had most of it together within an hour and a half. Was a bit disappointed. I don’t remember swingsets being so low. The bolts are in tight but when my 5 year old grandson gets on it you can see the stress on the top bar where they connect. I don’t see how 2 to 3 kids can play on it at one time. Not like how when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Verlene Austin

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Screws strip EASILY. Beware once you tighten them the slightest bit... they will strip if you need to loosen them. Ended up having to buy matching replacements for several as they couldn’t be used again. Pretty easy to setup outside of the cheap screws. They should at least include a few extra as backup.
customer_reviews.author: kubball3

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old grandsons love this set! The trampoline is a hit, as well as the circular swing. They beg to go outside often. It was missing a piece, but after contacting the company a replacement part arrived two weeks later and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: eberci

customer_reviews.title: Swing set is a very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swing set for my grandsons ages 5 & 15mos. They live in California. The set is very nice and sturdy. All the surface areas are coated so they don’t get hot in the sun.The older child loves it and is able to use all the activities. This set is will worth the money. I believe it will last them quite a few years
customer_reviews.author: Stacy George

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer won't respond
customer_reviews.text: Beware....Don't count on customer support here. We have been writing to the manufacturer for two weeks about some missing parts. We only get an auto response that says nothing. We are stuck with a half put together swing set and no help. I understand that things are a little difficult right now but there is no excuse not to respond. Email still works. Do I have to take it apart and ship it back?
customer_reviews.author: E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have (2) 8 year old and a 2 year old that can all play on it equally. directions could have been more clear on so parts otherwise solid 4 rating
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Byrge

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Our girls love it! It took my husband about 5-6 hours to put together. However, the stakes came out of the ground when our friends kids got on it, shes like 10. So its good for kids up to like 7 maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love love love this swing set! Has everything and wasn’t to bad to put together! Get some help and it goes by fast!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble solo if you're handy. 2hrs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kids and they are loving it. Keeps them away from their electronics and outside being active. I solo assembled this but I am also quite handy with tools. Took about 2hours. The trampoline took an additional half hour assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great swing  set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swing set just have to Barry the poles so kids don't get hurt but kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mize

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. The pieces were not labeled so it wasn’t the easiest task to put this together but I managed. The little piece that keeps the handle on the trampoline in place was broken but it’s not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: zionismisracism

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy for multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows a whole bunch of kids on the swingset I have a bunch of neighbor kids that come over and play on the swing set with my grandson and went all these kids around and playing it really isn't very sturdy and no they're not all overweight
customer_reviews.author: Quilts2much

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The box was delivered with a large hole in the box that was taped over. Still waiting for my husband to finish putting it together but so far we are missing the trampoline jumping mat and the swing saucer seat. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: Pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: So the assembly to this playset for the most part would have been easy but there were a few holes that were not drilled correctly, we were also missing a bolt for the basketball board. The netting for the soccer goal was a mess. Parts were not labeled. But all in all my boys love it. Just was a pain to put together. with 2 people it took us 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product took all day to assemble. It wasn't the easiest but me and my husband finally got it. My toddler loves it. I love that there is so much for him to do within one playground set.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: We got this swing set for our grandchildren ages 2,4,and 5. I’m assembled it by myself. It took a while because I’m in my mid fifty’s and a female. It’s well worth the money. I will update my review after the grandchildren come at the end of the month.
customer_reviews.author: jessica echevarria

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR YOUNGER KIDS
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old and almost 7 year old and they are over the moon with this set. It's definitely scaled to younger kids, but sturdy enough for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Martorana

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons second birthday! Great little set - took my husband and his brother about 1.5 hours to assemble. All the parts were packaged with the product. Product does come with a grounding kit, however it's not the greatest. I bought an additional grounding kit for good measure. Overall I would really recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Manson

customer_reviews.title: Kids are very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This play toy has been a huge hit! We bought it to amuse the youngsters at a backyard wedding, and multiple kids were able to play at the same time with so many options. Set up was fairly easy, and it's helpful to have at least two people assembling.
customer_reviews.author: geeno

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's decent.. But not the most sturdy thing I've ever seen
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Small but Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Small set but was expecting that. This is grandmas and grampas so they needed playspace but didnt need the big ones. They love it. Got the baby swing so they (twins) can enjoy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SET
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this set is amazing. Our 3 year old and 5 year old can play very well on it. I can even swing on the saucer thing-I know I shouldn't but it holds me well, and I am 5'5 143 lbs. Great play set, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: kids love this swingset. wasn't too difficult to put together, took about 3-4 hours with 2 adults. we bought extra anchors to ensure that it doesn't lift up when playing on it. great value! only gave 4 stars because it was missing 2 bolts/nuts for assembly, HOWEVER- contacted the manufacturer with the missing parts and they were shipped free within the week. very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and it’s sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to put together but wasnt extremely complicated. Kids love it and it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mehran khan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect activity set
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter adores her birthday gift. Not too big but packed with super cool features. She wants to play on it everyday. Circuit training for a tiny tike. Couldn’t have chosen a better all in one set.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fun Swingset
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to assemble. I will have to see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are 4 and 2 and they live this swing set. It's just the right size.for the two of them and their.driends.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swing set!!
customer_reviews.text: This swing set is so nice!! Not too big but also not too small. It’s perfect!! The soccer net and basketball hoop are a bonus! Took my husband and son about 4 hrs to build. Very sturdy and nice color too. If it’s going to rain we just take the round swing off so it won’t get destroyed. I defiantly recommend. My kids LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Alamo

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her play set. It wasn't too bad to put together. I needed help on one part by another adult. But other than that, it didn't take too long.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Actual dimensions are disproportionate.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Dec of '18 and I wish I could be refunded. The photo looked nice but the actual dimensions are disproportionate. The saucer, trapeze bar, swing, and seesaw are to high off the ground and the top header pole sits too low for any of the swings to get a decent range of motion for my toddlers. Incredibly impractical design. I would've given it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Francis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy great product... all was easy to put together except the boys had to reread instructions for soccer net. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Shara Smile

customer_reviews.title: ... children ages from 2 to 11 and they all love
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 children ages from 2 to 11 and they all love it
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this and so does my daughter and her little friends. Put together myself easy to assemble. I love how the bolts are with parts and just put together
customer_reviews.author: Kenosha

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces for monkey bar to hook on
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces. Once we finally got started on it we realised their was missing pieces. Pieces that attach the monkey bars to the frame are missing. Not sure how to go about getting the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Great starter playground set for small kids. Easy to assemble. Fits in small backyards.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and loved
customer_reviews.text: Easy yo assemble except for a few missing bolts. My kids love it and its pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great but assembly is awful
customer_reviews.text: Great play set but nothing is labeled so assembling was a pain. Few bolts missing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's not really hard to put together and of course it's a hit with the kids. Love the bright colors. Only thing is some of the holes on the slide parts are not even so the little rails look slanted but it doesn't mess with function.
customer_reviews.author: sienna holden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids love this. The 5 yr old said that Nana lives in the park. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I took my husband about four hours to put it together but we had a missing part and after those hours he was not able to finish because of that. My kid was very disappointed. Now i am just hoping they ship the part fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: xochitl de la luz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took about 4-5 hours to assemble. Looks great and my two year old and five year old enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! We have had it for 2 weeks, and all of the kids I watch (ages 3-10) love it! It took us two afternoons to put together, but honestly the most difficult part was threading the dang soccer net onto the bars! My daughter has been so excited about it everyday, and is usually asking to play on it by 7am, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: too small for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not enough space between each activities. it look space out, but it is not. Too close together for each kid to really enjoy if you have more than 3 kids trying to play at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Best one !!!
customer_reviews.text: For my 2 nieces , ages 1 and 7 this is the perfect playground
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble for me. Had it up in 6 hours. I was the only one putting it up so it took a bit with 2 kids under the age of 2. Lll
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Great playground
customer_reviews.text: Very great playground. High quality material. Very easy to assemble. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Qulaity
customer_reviews.text: Product Quality is not so good, Making too much noise, Packaging was completely mess, all items were open, some parts as showing in assembly book different in box, making too noise, claiming for 8 stations, even if 2 kids seating making lot of noise. No recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeevesh kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great play set for children
customer_reviews.text: Bought swingset as gift for my Grandkids. The Parents said it was easy to set up. Kids love all the different activities.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy G

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren lovin’ this
customer_reviews.text: Had it put together in 3 hours, directions are so-so! Plus I was shorted a screw for the seat on the glider...wth!!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Don"t buy one
customer_reviews.text: IT's stillsetting at wy front door can't use it in a condo
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Dean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: My boys range from 1 1/2yrs. to 9. They all love it! It came with anchors, and all the bolts were where they go so kinda pre assembled, we loved that! I am able to swing on the saucer swing!! Great price for the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this set. It has soooo many great activities. She actually said her legs were hurting. Then I realized it was from her work out. So great for the price. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LEEBRA RICKS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This swing set was almost impossible to assemble even with a carpenter assembling it. Prices did not fit well together. Very disappointed especially for the money I paid for it !
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marek

customer_reviews.title: Always parent supervision b/c older children that visit may rough house and set will lift
customer_reviews.text: I have four grandkids ages 5 to 2 years and it withstands them all on this play set. It did have to be mounted and pushed back between their grass and a flatter diet surface to make it more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rem

customer_reviews.title: Swing set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandaughter to help during quarantine time. She is 4 and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jane l.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy set up! So much for the kids to do! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 and 2 year old love it. It has lasted a whole summer with no issues or breaking
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed about how flimsy this is. I have two little boys (under 30 pounds each) and it looks like it's going to snap in half if the are both on it. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey O.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 1 year old love it! Wish the slide was a little nicer. It’s too small and narrow. Other than that, it’s great. We assembled it in 2-3 hours
customer_reviews.author: sharjeel

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very durable, have it in a daycare and it gets used a lot by the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble. In the instructions the parts are labeled but the actual physical parts aren't, but its not too difficult to figure out. Just don't drop any pieces bc they are IMPOSSIBLE to find.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Not to hard to put together my son loves it ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Read the description carefully. It is for preschool age children or very lightweights.
customer_reviews.text: A bit challenging for us to assemble ( but that might be just us🥴).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SWING SET
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great swingset. It comes with plenty of extras for the kiddos. But unfortunately, the balls didn’t inflate properly and will not hold air. Other than that, after everything was put together and tightened, it’s perfect! My child loves it and for the price, it was a GREAT deal!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Made kind of cheap, but you get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Made kind of cheap, but you get what you pay for. The size of the swing set is small.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi M.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product!! HOWEVER, it states everything is pretty much pre assembled, thats not true. Everything comes apart in the box. While shipping my box came apart making a hole and some bolts and nuts got out. Kind of irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love it. Had to pry them off even though it’s cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: We love our swingset!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have this swingset. My kids have been having a blast on it! My husband put it together and it does take a few hours. He also had an almost 4 year old assisting him though.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Householder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Activity Swing Set
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren, ages 5 and 3 love the different activities to do on this swing set. It is very well made and safe for them. Thank-you! Beverly
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to put together and baby loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our Grand Daughter. Was easy to put together and baby loved it! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

product_meta.title: FITNESS REALITY KIDS ‘The Ultimate’ 8 Station Sports Series Metal Swing Set
product_meta.description: FITNESS REALITY KIDS. Have fun! Play safe! Built with strong 2" Tubular steel frame and able to take up to 9 kids at a time, The FITNESS REALITY KIDS 8 station sports series metal swing set has all the fun features that will help kids stay active, healthy and develop sports skills for a Lifetime. Designed for children ages 3-8 years old, This sports playground includes a 36" Fitness jumper trampoline, a 32" Flying saucer, a glider, a slide, a monkey bar, a swing, a basketball hoop and backboard, and a soccer goal with net etc. As kids play they are also getting a good workout and when they associate play and sports that feeling will stay with them as long as they are challenged. The FITNESS REALITY KIDS sports metal swing set will get your kids outdoors instead of playing video games, on the computer or watching TV all day. So let your kids have fun with the FITNESS REALITY KIDS ‘the ultimate' 8 station sports series metal swing set. 8 fun activity stations: 36" Fitness jumper trampoline: made with a heavy gauge welded steel frame, heat treated springs and USA made jumping mat. It can handle kids up to 80 lbs. Included is a safety handle bar to hold on to. 1 swing with contoured plastic seats and thick plastic covered swing chains for added hand protection. Monkey bar with handles– builds arm strength and helps keep off excess weight through exercise. Fitness slide with ladder – made of tough poly Propylene plastic, UV treated with added antifreeze protection for the worst of weather conditions. Rolled sides for hand protection. 32" Flying saucer – fits one or two kids up to 80 lbs. Total, and adjustable rope length for different saucer height. 2 person glider - 2 plastic seats with foot rests and tube handles. Basketball hoop and backboard – 17" Steel hoop with acrylic backboard. Soccer goal with net - allows kids to play soccer and improve their soccer skills. Basketball, soccer ball and an air pump are included.
feature_bullets: 8 fun activity stations that will keep 9 kids busy at the same time. Kids benefit from frequent physical activity and exercise. You benefit from knowing the kids are secure in your own backyard
Includes a 36" Trampoline, a 32" Flying saucer, a slide, a glider, a monkey bar, a swing, a basketball hoop and backboard, a soccer goal with net, a basketball, a soccer ball and an air pump
2" Powder coated tubular steel construction. Each station has 80lbs weight capacity except glider has 80 lbs. Weight Capacity per seat
Meets ASTM (American Society for Testing and materials) safety standards. Warranty: 2 years frame, and 6 months on all other components
Designed for children between the ages of 3 and 8 years old. Product Dimensions: 157.5" L x 107.5" W x 72" H (without trampoline). trampoline dimension: 42" L x 42" W x 58" H
